verbose_text: Specifically, the oncogenic MSH6-CXCR4- TGFB1 feedback loop can accelerate gliomagenesis, proliferation (G1 phase), migration and invasion (EMT), stemness, angiogenesis and antiapoptotic effects by regulating the p-STAT3 / Slug and p- Smad2/3/ZEB2 signaling pathways in GBM.
evidence: TGFB1 feedback loop can accelerate gliomagenesis, proliferation (G1 phase), migration and invasion (EMT), stemness, angiogenesis
